awards.title: Hawaii B plus State Scholarship
awards.summary: available to undergraduate students who graduated from a State of Hawai'i public high school after 2005 and earned a cumulative grade point average of 3.0 or higher based on high school transcripts.

awards.title: 2019 McDonald's Regionals Scholarship Winner
awards.summary: This scholarship is awarded to senior high school students in Hawaii who have demonstrated good or above work capibilites at McDonalds. This scholarship is awareded to 10 people.
